DOC.brief_summary: The study serves as a confirmation of safety, tolerance and efficacy of PICOPREP in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of PICOPREP in Patients Needed to Clean the Bowel Prior to X-ray Examination, Endoscopy or Surgery.
DOC.criteria: Patients receiving PICOPREP® for bowel evacuation prior to endoscopy or surgery Patients in which prescription of PICOPREP® is contraindicated
